releaseNotes:
Auto-generated from commit: fix: restore AI widget visibility and final user management update bug

- Fixed UserManager.tsx to correctly pass selectedUser to onSave, resolving the 'Email/Password required' error when editing profiles.
- Updated AIChatWidget.tsx to ensure master user (oidemianf@gmail.com) always has access, even if profile division is mismatched.
- Added 'DIRETORIA' to allowed AI widget roles for better consistency.
- This completes the 'redonda' (round/perfect) state of user management requested by the user.
